00344 #define ____    // needed by doxygen
00345 
00346 interface IBody;
00347 
00353 typedef struct
00354 {
00355         enum FW_PARAM m_type;   
00356 
00358         [switch_type(enum FW_PARAM), switch_is(m_type)]
00359         union 
00360         {
00361                 [case(FW_PARAM_ULONG)]          FWULONG m_ULONG;
00362                 [case(FW_PARAM_FLOAT)]          FWFLOAT m_FLOAT;
00363                 [case(FW_PARAM_STRING)]         FWSTRING m_STRING;
00364                 [case(FW_PARAM_VECTOR)]         FWVECTOR3 m_VECTOR;
00365                 [case(FW_PARAM_PUNKNOWN)]       FWPUNKNOWN m_PUNKNOWN;
00366                 [case(FW_PARAM_PBONE)]          FWPUNKNOWN m_PBONE;
00367                 [case(FW_PARAM_PBODY)]          FWPUNKNOWN m_PBODY;
00368         } ____;
00369 
00370         FWULONG m_nIndex;                       
00371         FWSTRING m_pName;                       
00372 } FWPARAM;
00373 
00374 #undef ____

00410 #ifndef MAKE_HRESULT
00411         #define FACILITY_ITF 4
00412         #define MAKE_HRESULT(sev,fac,code) ((HRESULT) (((unsigned long)(sev)<<31) | ((unsigned long)(fac)<<16) | ((unsigned long)(code))) )
00413 #endif
